This condition is true when the enemy ship contains less than 15 enemy crews inside it
This condition is true when the enemy ship contains more than 15 enemy crews inside it
This condition is true when the enemy ship contains less than 20 enemy crews inside it
This condition is true when the enemy ship contains more than 20 enemy crews inside it
This condition is true when current room is still currently reloading.
This condition is true when the subject's starting room is still currently reloading.
This condition is true when current room has no reload progress.
This condition is true when the subject's starting room has no reload progress.
This condition is true when current room has any reload progress.
This condition is true when the subject's starting room has any reload progress.
This condition is true when there are 10 or less active enemy missiles targeting your ship
This condition is true when there are more than 10 active enemy missiles targeting your ship
This condition is true when there are 10 or less active friendly missiles targeting the enemy ship
This condition is true when there are more than 10 active friendly missiles targeting the enemy ship
